content:
"[Blurring Is the Auto-Tune of UI Design, and Other Things We Thought About While Designing Wildcard 2.0](http://www.subtraction.com/2015/08/11/blurring-is-the-auto-tune-of-ui-design/)". 

I love how the Wildcard team have made the effort to sweat the details to ensure their app stands out. In an increasingly competitive app marketplace this sort of focus on interaction design is vital.
summary: "Blurring Is the Auto-Tune of UI Design..." @wildcard sweats the details to ensure their app stands out http://www.subtraction.com/2015/08/11/blurring-is-the-auto-tune-of-ui-design/
